# Read AAU Membership

```{r}
# knitr options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 8,
                      fig.asp = 0.618,
                      echo = TRUE)
knitr::knit_engines$set(python = reticulate::eng_python)

# include user functions
source(file="../user-functions.R")

aaude_inst <- grabData('aaude', "SELECT * FROM WAREUSER.INSTITUTION") %>%
  select(-warehouse_load_date)

aaude_inst
```

# Write AAU Membership Table

```{r}
system.time({
  institutions %>%
    filter(is_aau_institution == "Y") %>%
    select(unitid = unit_id,
           inst_name) %>%
    write_db("ched-staging", "aau_membership", add = FALSE)
})


```
